revised_title: Royal Society Notes: Honours, Elections, and Research Grants
tldr: This article from the 'Notes and Records of the Royal Society of London' in 1939 highlights various honours awarded to scientists, elections to the Royal Society, international conferences and congresses, and research grants provided for various scientific projects. It also mentions the Society's involvement in international scientific unions and research stations.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science and Technology
